page.title: 15Amateur Dramatics
page.content: {The Old Catterick Theatre Company }is an enthusiastic group of local amateurs who have at least two productions each year.They are made up of people of all ages and include children as young as ten years. The productions include singing, dancing,drama,and humour.The latest production was the pantomime "Ali Ba Ba and the Forty Robbers".This was performed in the Booth Memorial Hall on two evenings during the 1985 October half term holidays.Both performances were well attended and refreshments were served. The profits made by the Theatre Company are shared amongst village organisations.
